item.title: Fixing the Lenovo X1 Carbonâ€™s washed out display
item.description: Although the X1 Carbon has a much better looking display than the T430s, it still looked a bit washed out when I compared it to other monitors right next to it. The entire display had a weak blue tint and it was difficult to use for extended periods, especially at maximum brightness. A quick Google search took me to a LaunchPad entry about a better ICC profile for the X1 Carbon.
